articles.description: The spectators who were at Sandringham on Christmas Day describe a "pleasant" but "different vibe".
articles.content: The Royal Family has renewed its decades-long tradition of congregating at St Mary Magdalene Church on the Sandringham Estate in Norfolk on Christmas Day. A lot has changed since their last festive g… [+4751 chars]
